update `CBQA` set CBQA02 = #{cbqa02,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBQA03 = #{cbqa03,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBQA04 = #{cbqa04,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBQA05 = #{cbqa05,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBQA06 = #{cbqa06,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBQA07 = #{cbqa07,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBQA08 = #{cbqa08,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBQA09 = #{cbqa09,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBQA10 = #{cbqa10,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBQA11 = #{cbqa11,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where CBQA01 = #{cbqa01,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT d.CALA08,c.CBPB12,c.CBPB08,a.CBQB09,a.CBQB10,a.CBQA01,e.CBPK07, f.CBQA07,a.CBQB03,a.CBQA01,a.CBQB01 as cbqb01,b.CBPM08 from CBQB a LEFT JOIN CBPM b on b.CBPM01=a.CBQB08
LEFT JOIN gs_goods_sn sn on sn.sn=a.CBQB10 LEFT JOIN CBPB c on c.CBPB01=sn.goods_id
LEFT JOIN CALA d on d.CALA01=c.CBPB10 LEFT JOIN CBPK e on e.CBPK01=b.CBPK01 LEFT JOIN CBQA f on f.CBQA01=a.CBQA01
WHERE a.CBQA01= #{cbqa01}
SELECT CBQA07,CBQA08,CBQA09,CBQA01 FROM CBQA ORDER BY CBQA08 DESC

SELECT a.CBQA07,a.CBQA08,a.CBQA09,a.CBQA01,a.CBQA11 FROM CBQA a where a.CBQA06=0 and a.CBQA07 like concat('%', #{cbqa07}, '%') and a.CBQA08 >= #{startTime} and a.CBQA08 <=#{endTime}
and date_format(a.CBQA08,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(a.CBQA08,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
order by a.CBQA08 desc

SELECT CONCAT_WS ('-', b.CALA08, a.CBPB12,a.CBPB08,c.CBPM09) f, c.CBPM09,c.CBPM08 from CBPB a LEFT JOIN CALA b ON a.CBPB10=b.CALA01 LEFT JOIN CBPM c on c.CBPM08=a.CBPB01 LEFT JOIN CBPK d ON d.CBPK01=c.CBPK01
where a.CBPB06=0 and d.check_status = 2 and c.CBPM07 =0 and d.CBPK01 =#{cbpk01} and c.CBPM09 like concat('%', #{cbpm09}, '%') order by d.CBPK08 desc

SELECT c.sn as cbpm09 from
gs_goods_sn c where c.delete_flag = 0 and c.status=1 and c.groud_status=1 and c.repair_status=0
and c.sn like concat('%', #{cbpm09}, '%')
and c.goods_id = #{cbpm08}
order by c.create_time desc limit 50

SELECT d.CALA08,c.CBPB12,c.CBPB08,a.CBQB09,a.CBQB10,a.CBQA01,e.CBPK07, f.CBQA07,f.CBQA08, a.CBQB03,a.CBQA01,a.CBQB01 as cbqb01,b.CBPM08 from CBQB a LEFT JOIN CBPM b on b.CBPM01=a.CBQB08
LEFT JOIN gs_goods_sn sn on sn.sn=a.CBQB10 LEFT JOIN CBPB c on c.CBPB01=sn.goods_id
LEFT JOIN CALA d on d.CALA01=c.CBPB10 LEFT JOIN CBPK e on e.CBPK01=b.CBPK01 LEFT JOIN CBQA f on f.CBQA01=a.CBQA01 where f.CBQA06=0 and f.CBQA07 like concat('%', #{cbqa07}, '%')
and date_format(f.CBQA08,'%y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y-%m-%d')
and date_format(f.CBQA08,'%y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y-%m-%d')
